mapper.select: select *,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATED from sys_statistics_title where create_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') order by create_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '1' END AS `type` FROM patient_register_service prs where DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and babyName not like '%测试%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `status` FROM patient_register_service prs WHERE prs.`status` = 6 and DATE_FORMAT(prs.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and babyName not like '%测试%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), CASE WHEN 1 THEN '4' END AS `status` FROM patient_register_service prs INNER JOIN sys_register_service srs ON prs.sys_register_service_id = srs.id WHERE (prs.`status` = 1 OR prs.`status` = 2 OR prs.`status` = 3 OR prs.`status` = 4) and babyName not like '%测试%' and DATE_FORMAT(srs.date, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) a ORDER BY type

select * from (SELECT COUNT(*)as count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '1' END AS `type` FROM patient_register_service prs WHERE (prs.`status` = 1 OR prs.`status` = 2 OR prs.`status` = 3 OR prs.`status` = 4) and babyName not like '%测试%' AND DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT COUNT(*)as count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `type` FROM patient_register_service prs WHERE ( prs.`status` = 2 OR prs.`status` = 3 OR prs.`status` = 4) AND babyName NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) a order by type
SELECT DISTINCT openid FROM sys_wechat_record SR WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SR.infoTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND SR.text like '%/:share%' and SR.opercode = 2002;
SELECT DISTINCT openid FROM sys_wechat_record SR WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SR.infoTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND SR.text like '%谢谢您的支持/:share%' and SR.opercode = 2002;
SELECT DISTINCT swr.openid FROM sys_wechat_record swr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(swr.infoTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and openid is not null and openid!=''
SELECT sst.totalvictorynums FROM sys_statistics_title sst WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sst.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -1 DAY)
SELECT sst.totalvictoryorder FROM sys_statistics_title sst WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sst.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -1 DAY)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT open_id) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '1' END AS `type` FROM sys_log WHERE title LIKE '00000052%' and create_date like '${create_date}%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `type` FROM sys_log WHERE title LIKE '00000052%' and create_date like '${create_date}%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '3' END AS `type` FROM sys_log WHERE title LIKE '00000053%' and create_date like '${create_date}%' ) a GROUP BY type

SELECT * from ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT open_id) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '1' END AS `type` FROM sys_log WHERE title LIKE '00000052%' and DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') UNION all SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `type` FROM sys_log WHERE title LIKE '00000052%' and DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') UNION all SELECT count(DISTINCT ddd) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '3' END AS `type` from (select SUBSTRING_INDEX(sl.title, 'CookieID:', -1) as ddd from sys_log sl where sl.title like '00000052%' and DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY create_date desc)a where a.ddd not like '00000052%' )a
SELECT sst.totalreadnums FROM sys_statistics_title sst WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sst.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -1 DAY)
SELECT * FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '3' END AS `type` FROM sys_doctor where DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') )a ORDER BY type

SELECT * FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `type` FROM sys_doctor where create_date is null or DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') )a ORDER BY type
SELECT token from sys_wechatparameter where id='1'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '1' END AS `status` FROM patient_register_service prs INNER JOIN order_property op ON prs.id = op.patient_register_service_id WHERE ( prs.`status` = 1 OR prs.`status` = 2 OR prs.`status` = 3 OR prs.`status` = 4 OR prs.`status` = 5 ) and op.yellow_cattle='no' AND babyName NOT LIKE '%测试%' and DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date},'%Y-%m-%d') union ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, CASE WHEN 1 THEN '2' END AS `status` FROM patient_register_service prs INNER JOIN account_pay_record apr ON apr.order_id = prs.id where ( prs.`status` = 1 OR prs.`status` = 2 OR prs.`status` = 3 OR prs.`status` = 4 OR prs.`status` = 5 )AND babyName NOT LIKE '%测试%' and apr.`status`='success' and DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date},'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT DISTINCT openid, babyName FROM patient_baby_emr pbe WHERE DATE_FORMAT(pbe.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT sat.totalZYQPbe FROM sys_statistics_title sat WHERE sat.create_date = DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL - 1 DAY)
SELECT count(DISTINCT(sl.create_by) ) from sys_log sl where create_date like '${create_date}%' and sl.title = '00000043'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account_pay_record apr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(apr.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND apr.`status`='success'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account_pay_record apr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(apr.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND apr.`status`='return'
SELECT IFNULL(sst.totalVIP,1070) FROM sys_statistics_title sst WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sst.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') =DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -1 DAY)
SELECT count(DISTINCT sys_user_id) AS count FROM consult_session WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{create_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND state = 'completed'
